price: 48. N’obéis pas aux mécréants et aux hypocrites ! Ne fais pas grand cas de leurs méfaits ! Confie-toi à Allah ! Qu’Allah te suffise en parfait protecteur.
arabic: وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَدَعۡ أَذَىٰهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna wadaʿ adhāhum watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
